pages.text: Redfieldius is genus of redfieldiiforme ray-finned fish from the early Jurassic. While redfieldiiforms were common in late Triassic (Daedalichthys for example), Redfieldius was the last member of the group. It had a similar appearance to other redfiedlfiiformes, and some Triassic genera like Cionichthys were once described as Redfieldius.
